turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, what can I do for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Can I get a Bella Luna pickup order started, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bella Luna pick up order sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pizza would you like to order today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And times of the pizzas that I was going to order. I was looking to get two pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 ok, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For both pizzas, I was looking for small.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 small ok what are your choice of toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was hoping to get two chicken barbecue small pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 small chicken BBQ ok any other instruction.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was hoping to get a thick crust on those pizzas as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 small chicken BBQ all with thick crust, is that your final order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok with 2 small pizza your total comes to 24 dollars, shall we go ahead.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'm all set.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, have a good day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very kindly.
